snippet: Gilberto Valle’s lawyer complained to a judge that moving her client to a Brooklyn detention center and exposing him to other prisoners would put him in danger.
abstract: Lawyer for Gilberto Valle, New York City police officer charged with plotting to kidnap, kill and eat women, complains to judge that moving her client to a Brooklyn detention center and exposing him to other prisoners would put him in danger; latest twist in Valle's case comes less than two weeks before he is scheduled to go on trial.
lead_paragraph: Gilberto Valle’s lawyer complained to a judge that moving her client to a Brooklyn detention center and exposing him to other prisoners would put him in danger.

headline.seo: Gilberto Valle, Officer Held in Kidnapping Plot, Balks at Jail Transfer
headline.main: Officer Held in Plot to Kidnap Women Balks at Jail Transfer
headline.print_headline: Police Officer Detained in a Scheme To Kidnap Women Balks at a Transfer
